sentences.en: A compound resultingas resultingthe reaction of hydrochloric acid with an organic base.
sentences.cn: 一种黄色、气味浓烈、腐蚀性的氮和盐酸的混合物,能溶解金属(包括金).

sentences.en: Acidoresistant: Without corrode in 2.5 % hydrochloric Acid solution at 24 hour.
sentences.cn: 耐酸性: 在2.5%盐酸溶液中浸24小时无明显腐蚀现象.

sentences.en: An excess amount of hydrochloric acid in the stomach can cause indigestion.
sentences.cn: 胃中盐酸过量会导致消化不良.

sentences.en: Gastric juice contains hydrochloric acid to provide an acidic solution for pepsin.
sentences.cn: 胃液内含有盐酸给胃蛋白酶提供酸溶液.

sentences.en: Gold can't be dissolved in hydrochloric acid.
sentences.cn: 黄金不会溶解于盐酸之中.

sentences.en: Hydrochloric and sulfuric acids are called inorganic substances.
sentences.cn: 盐酸和硫磺酸被称作无机物.

sentences.en: I have tested that the rock does not react with hydrochloric acid ( HCI ).
sentences.cn: 我已检查测过,这岩石 盐酸 不反应.

sentences.en: It is appraised as a hydrochloric acid corrosion accident of concrete structure.
sentences.cn: 混凝土结构受盐酸腐蚀既有酸化腐蚀的特点,又有氯化物腐蚀的特征.

sentences.en: Methods Hydrochloric acid ambroxol was applied to treat 49 premature with pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 方法应用盐酸氨溴索针剂治疗49例早产儿肺炎患儿.

sentences.en: Sodium hydroxide and hydrochloric acid can be sourced in the city.
sentences.cn: 氢氧化钠和盐酸市内采购.

sentences.en: The banana can also neutralize the hydrochloric acid in gastric juice and reduce the pain.
sentences.cn: 香蕉还可以中和胃酸和减少疼痛.

sentences.en: The optimized rate of bauxite ores and hydrochloric acid was 1∶1.5.
sentences.cn: 结果表明:随着盐酸用量的增加,铝土矿溶出率增加,铝土矿与盐酸的最佳比例是1∶1.5.

sentences.en: This mixture is then mixed with dilute hydrochloric acid.
sentences.cn: 氰基丙烯酸正丁酯是在超强力胶中发现的一种化学物质.

sentences.en: Use titration to discover the concentration of a solution of hydrochloric acid.
sentences.cn: 通过滴定确定盐酸溶液的浓度.

sentences.en: We now dissolve everything in a mixture of hydrochloric acid at 35% and chlorine bleach (sodium hypochlorite) at 5%, in a proportion of 2 to 1.
sentences.cn: 现在我们用35%的盐酸和5%的漂白剂（次氯酸钠）把所有金属溶解。 盐酸和次氯酸钠的比例为2：1。
